reviewText: this video was TERRIBLE! why did i view it, you might ask? COMPLETELY BY MISTAKE!!! i was doing a paper for school on children's reading techniques... let's just say this offered little to no help, though i MUST say the snoothy guzzlesmort did provide for EMBARASSING comic relief.  (not that THAT would be ANY reason why ANY OF YOU should EVER view this horrid thing!)  BETTER, if you're ever thinking of watching this, do THIS: Cash your paycheck, pay your bills, and with what is left over, flush it DIRECTLY down the toilet, thus cutting out the middle man...  HEY, you'll be more satisfied in the end!!!
